 2002-19582002-11-210,  ,  ,  ,  ,  LAB,  TB,  , 
ActEmployment Equity Act
PrecisEnactment of an ORDER SPECIFYING THE ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE FOR THE PURPOSES OF THE EMPLOYMENT EQUITY ACT which specifies that the R.C.M.P. is a portion of the public sector to which the Employment Equity Act applies.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0422 Publication Date: 2002-12-04
